description: MTND Exercício 4d: L = {ww^R | w ∈ {a,b}*} - Palíndromos par (não-det: adivinha meio)
definition:
Estados: q0, q_scan, q_mark_end, q_match_a, q_match_b, q_back, qf, qr
Alfabeto_Entrada: a, b
Alfabeto_Fita: a, b, X, Y, _
Simbolo_Branco: _
Estado_Inicial: q0
Estado_Aceitacao: qf
Estado_Rejeicao: qr
Transicoes:
q0, _, qf, _, N
q0, X, q0, X, R
q0, Y, q0, Y, R
q0, a, q_scan, X, R
q0, b, q_scan, Y, R
q_scan, a, q_scan, a, R
q_scan, a, q_mark_end, a, L
q_scan, b, q_scan, b, R
q_scan, b, q_mark_end, b, L
q_scan, X, q_scan, X, R
q_scan, Y, q_scan, Y, R
q_scan, _, q_mark_end, _, L
q_mark_end, a, q_match_a, X, L
q_mark_end, b, q_match_b, Y, L
q_mark_end, X, qf, X, N
q_mark_end, Y, qf, Y, N
q_match_a, a, q_match_a, a, L
q_match_a, b, q_match_a, b, L
q_match_a, X, q_back, X, R
q_match_a, Y, qr, Y, N
q_match_a, _, qr, _, N
q_match_b, a, q_match_b, a, L
q_match_b, b, q_match_b, b, L
q_match_b, Y, q_back, Y, R
q_match_b, X, qr, X, N
q_match_b, _, qr, _, N
q_back, a, q0, X, R
q_back, b, q0, Y, R
q_back, X, qr, X, N
q_back, Y, qr, Y, N
